fields.title: Original text
fields.placeHolder: e.g. Productivity is the measure of how efficiently and effectively one can complete tasks and achieve goals. It is an essential aspect of personal and professional success, as it allows individuals to maximize their output while minimizing wasted time and effort. To improve productivity, one must prioritize tasks, set achievable goals, and eliminate distractions. Additionally, taking breaks and practicing self-care can help maintain focus and energy levels. By consistently striving for increased productivity, individuals can accomplish more in less time and ultimately achieve greater success in their endeavors.
